package.description:
The wiimote package provides a ROS node for the Wiimote and an optional Wii Motion Plus. The Wiimote is exposed as an IMU, as a joystick, and as a Wiimote (to benefit from more Wiimote-specific features).
The ROS API gives access to the accelerometer data, the gyroscope data (only with the Wii Motion Plus), the button state, and the battery state. The ROS API can also be used to control the rumble (vibrator) and LEDs, including specifying a time sequence of on/off transitions.
